text: maṉitaril palar (matilmēl pūṉaiyaip pōl) uṟutiyaṟṟa nilaimaiyil allāhvai vaṇaṅkukiṉṟaṉar. Avarkaḷai oru naṉmai aṭaintāl ataikkoṇṭu tirupti aṭaikiṉṟaṉar. Avarkaḷukku oru tīṅku ēṟpaṭṭālō avarkaḷ taṅkaḷ mukattai (allāhvai viṭṭum) tiruppik koḷkiṉṟaṉar. Ivarkaḷ im'maiyilum maṟumaiyilum naṣṭamaṭaintu viṭṭaṉar. Itutāṉ (cantēkamaṟṟa) teḷivāṉa perum naṣṭamākum
